title: Adobo
description: A traditional Filipino dish made with pork marinated in soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, and spices, then simmered until tender.
instructions: 1 kg pork belly, 1/2 cup soy sauce, 1/4 cup vinegar, 5 cloves garlic, 3 bay leaves, 1 tsp peppercorns, 1 tsp sugar (optional), 1/2 cup water, salt to taste,"1. Marinate pork in soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, and bay leaf for 30 minutes. 2. Cook marinated pork in a pot over medium heat until browned. 3. Add water and simmer until pork is tender. 4. Adjust seasoning and serve with rice."
keyword: pork belly, soy sauce, vinegar, garlic, bay leaves, peppercorns, sugar (optional), water, salt to taste

title: Sinigang na Baboy
description: A tangy pork soup with a savory-sour flavor from tamarind, cooked with vegetables like radish, eggplant, and string beans.
instructions: 1 kg pork spare ribs, 5 cups water, 1 cup tamarind pulp, 2 tomatoes, 1 onion, 1 radish, 100g string beans, 2 eggplants, 1 cup kangkong leaves, 1 green chili, salt to taste,"1. Boil pork with water and tamarind. 2. Add tomatoes, onions, and other vegetables. 3. Season with fish sauce and simmer until pork is tender. 4. Serve hot with rice."
keyword: pork spare ribs, water, tamarind pulp, tomatoes, onion, radish, string beans, eggplants, kangkong leaves, green chili, salt to taste

title: Kare-Kare
description: A rich peanut stew with oxtail, tripe, and vegetables, typically served with bagoong (fermented shrimp paste).
instructions: 1 kg oxtail, 1/2 cup peanut butter, 1 tbsp annatto seeds, 1 eggplant, 100g string beans, 1 banana heart, 1 cup bok choy, 5 cloves garlic, 1 onion, shrimp paste to taste,"1. Brown oxtail and tripe, then simmer until tender. 2. Add peanut butter and vegetables, cook until soft. 3. Serve with bagoong (fermented shrimp paste)."
keyword: oxtail, peanut butter, annatto seeds, eggplant, string beans, banana heart, bok choy, garlic, onion, shrimp paste to taste

title: Lechon Kawali
description: Crispy pork belly deep-fried to perfection, often served with lechon sauce or vinegar for dipping.
instructions: 1 kg pork belly, 1 tbsp salt, 1 tbsp peppercorns, 3 bay leaves, 5 cloves garlic, oil for frying,"1. Boil pork belly until tender. 2. Deep-fry until crispy, then slice and serve with dipping sauce."
keyword: pork belly, salt, peppercorns, bay leaves, garlic, oil for frying

title: Tinolang Manok
description: A light chicken soup with ginger, papaya, and chili leaves, creating a comforting and nutritious dish.
instructions: 1 kg chicken, 1 green papaya, 50g ginger, 5 cloves garlic, 1 onion, 1 cup malunggay leaves, 1 tbsp fish sauce, salt and pepper to taste,"1. Sauté ginger and onion, then add chicken. 2. Pour water and add green papaya and chili leaves. 3. Simmer until chicken is cooked through. 4. Season with salt and serve hot."
keyword: chicken, green papaya, ginger, garlic, onion, malunggay leaves, fish sauce, salt and pepper to taste

title: Pancit Canton
description: Stir-fried egg noodles with vegetables, pork, shrimp, and soy sauce, commonly served at Filipino gatherings.
instructions: 200g pancit canton noodles, 100g chicken, 100g shrimp, 1 carrot, 1/2 cabbage, 1 bell pepper, 50g snow peas, 1 onion, 5 cloves garlic, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 2 tbsp oyster sauce, salt and pepper to taste,"1. Stir-fry pork and shrimp with garlic and onion. 2. Add soy sauce, broth, and noodles, then cook until tender. 3. Add vegetables and stir-fry until well-mixed. 4. Serve warm with calamansi."
keyword: pancit canton noodles, chicken, shrimp, carrot, cabbage, bell pepper, snow peas, onion, garlic, soy sauce, oyster sauce, salt and pepper to taste

title: Bulalo
description: A beef marrow soup with corn and vegetables, slow-cooked to bring out its rich, meaty flavor.
instructions: 1 kg beef shank, 4 corn on the cob, 1 bunch bok choy, 100g string beans, 1 onion, 5 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp peppercorns, 1 tbsp fish sauce, salt to taste,"1. Boil beef shank with onion and peppercorns until tender. 2. Add corn and vegetables, then simmer. 3. Season with salt and serve hot."
keyword: beef shank, corn on the cob, bok choy, string beans, onion, garlic, peppercorns, fish sauce, salt to taste

title: Bicol Express
description: A spicy dish made with pork belly cooked in coconut milk and chili, originating from the Bicol region.
instructions: 1 kg pork belly, 2 cups coconut milk, 1/2 cup coconut cream, 3 tbsp shrimp paste, 5 green chili peppers, 2 red chili peppers, 5 cloves garlic, 1 onion, salt to taste,"1. Sauté pork belly with garlic and chili. 2. Add coconut milk and simmer until pork is tender. 3. Season with salt and serve over rice."
keyword: pork belly, coconut milk, coconut cream, shrimp paste, green chili peppers, red chili peppers, garlic, onion, salt to taste

title: Inihaw na Liempo
description: Grilled pork belly marinated in soy sauce and calamansi, delivering a smoky and flavorful taste.
instructions: 1 kg pork belly, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 1/4 cup calamansi juice, 5 cloves garlic, 1 tsp pepper, salt to taste, oil for grilling,"1. Marinate pork belly in soy sauce, calamansi, and spices. 2. Grill until browned and cooked through. 3. Slice and serve with dipping sauce."
keyword: pork belly, soy sauce, calamansi juice, garlic, pepper, salt to taste, oil for grilling

title: Laing
description: Taro leaves simmered in coconut milk and spicy chilis, creating a creamy, flavorful side dish.
instructions: 200g dried taro leaves, 2 cups coconut milk, 2 tbsp shrimp paste, 5 cloves garlic, 1 onion, 50g ginger, 5 red chili peppers, salt to taste,"1. Boil taro leaves with coconut milk, chili, and spices. 2. Simmer until leaves are tender and sauce is creamy. 3. Serve with rice."
keyword: dried taro leaves, coconut milk, shrimp paste, garlic, onion, ginger, red chili peppers, salt to taste

title: Kaldereta
description: A hearty stew made with beef, tomatoes, and bell peppers, usually served with steamed rice.
instructions: 1 kg beef, 1 cup tomato sauce, 1/4 cup liver spread, 2 potatoes, 2 carrots, 1 bell pepper, 1/2 cup green peas, 1/4 cup olives, 1 onion, 5 cloves garlic, salt and pepper to taste,"1. Sauté beef with garlic and onions. 2. Add tomato sauce, bell peppers, and potatoes. 3. Simmer until beef is tender. 4. Serve with rice."
keyword: beef, tomato sauce, liver spread, potatoes, carrots, bell pepper, green peas, olives, onion, garlic, salt and pepper to taste

title: Paksiw na Pata
description: Pork hock braised in soy sauce and vinegar with banana blossoms for a sweet-savory flavor.
instructions: 1 kg pork hock, 1/4 cup vinegar, 1/4 cup soy sauce, 1/2 cup banana blossoms, 5 cloves garlic, 1 onion, 3 bay leaves, 1 tbsp peppercorns, 2 tbsp brown sugar,"1. Braise pork hock in soy sauce and vinegar with garlic. 2. Add banana blossoms and simmer until tender. 3. Serve with rice."
keyword: pork hock, vinegar, soy sauce, banana blossoms, garlic, onion, bay leaves, peppercorns, brown sugar

title: Pinakbet
description: A vegetable dish cooked with shrimp paste, often including squash, eggplant, bitter melon, and okra.
instructions: 200g squash, 1 eggplant, 1 bitter melon, 100g okra, 100g string beans, 2 tomatoes, 3 tbsp shrimp paste, 100g pork belly,"1. Sauté shrimp paste with garlic and onion. 2. Add vegetables and cook until tender. 3. Serve as a side dish."
keyword: squash, eggplant, bitter melon, okra, string beans, tomatoes, shrimp paste, pork belly

title: Ginataang Gulay
description: Mixed vegetables cooked in coconut milk, creating a creamy and savory side dish.
instructions: 200g squash, 100g string beans, 2 cups coconut milk, 100g shrimp, 5 cloves garlic, 1 onion, fish sauce to taste,"1. Sauté mixed vegetables with garlic and coconut milk. 2. Simmer until creamy and vegetables are tender. 3. Serve with rice."
keyword: squash, string beans, coconut milk, shrimp, garlic, onion, fish sauce to taste

title: Arroz Caldo
description: A comforting rice porridge with chicken, ginger, and garlic, topped with fried garlic and green onions.
instructions: 1 cup glutinous rice, 500g chicken, 5 cloves garlic, 1 onion, 50g ginger, 1 tbsp fish sauce, salt to taste, green onions for garnish,"1. Sauté garlic, onion, and ginger. 2. Add chicken and cook until browned. 3. Add rice and water, simmer until porridge is thick. 4. Garnish and serve warm."
keyword: glutinous rice, chicken, garlic, onion, ginger, fish sauce, salt to taste, green onions for garnish

title: Lumpiang Shanghai
description: Crispy spring rolls filled with ground pork, carrots, and spices, commonly served as an appetizer.
instructions: 500g ground pork, 1 carrot, 1 onion, 5 cloves garlic, 2 green onions, salt and pepper to taste, spring roll wrapper, oil for frying,"1. Mix ground pork with minced carrots and spices. 2. Wrap in spring roll wrapper and fry until crispy. 3. Serve with dipping sauce."
keyword: ground pork, carrot, onion, garlic, green onions, salt and pepper to taste, spring roll wrapper, oil for frying

title: Sinigang na Hipon
description: A sour shrimp soup with tamarind and vegetables like radish, tomatoes, and green beans.
instructions: 500g shrimp, 5 cups water, 1 cup tamarind pulp, 2 tomatoes, 1 onion, 1 radish, 100g string beans, 2 eggplants, 1 cup kangkong leaves, salt to taste,"1. Boil shrimp with tamarind and vegetables. 2. Season with fish sauce. 3. Serve hot with rice."
keyword: shrimp, water, tamarind pulp, tomatoes, onion, radish, string beans, eggplants, kangkong leaves, salt to taste

title: Tortang Talong
description: Grilled eggplant omelette topped with ground pork or crab, a savory Filipino breakfast item.
instructions: 4 eggplants, 3 eggs, salt and pepper to taste, oil for frying,"1. Grill eggplant until tender, then peel. 2. Mash and mix with eggs. 3. Fry until golden brown."
keyword: eggplants, eggs, salt and pepper to taste, oil for frying

title: Bopis
description: A spicy pork lung dish cooked with vinegar, garlic, and chili, often served with rice.
instructions: 1 kg pork lungs, 1/4 cup vinegar, 1 bell pepper, 1 carrot, 1 onion, 5 cloves garlic, chili to taste, salt and pepper to taste,"1. Sauté pork lung with garlic and vinegar. 2. Add spices and simmer until cooked through. 3. Serve with rice."
keyword: pork lungs, vinegar, bell pepper, carrot, onion, garlic, chili to taste, salt and pepper to taste

title: Sisig
description: A sizzling dish made from chopped pig's face, flavored with onions, chili, and calamansi.
instructions: 1 kg pork cheeks, 1 onion, 1/4 cup calamansi juice, salt and pepper to taste, mayonnaise to taste,"1. Grill chopped pig's face until crispy. 2. Serve sizzling with onions and chili."

title: Ginisang Monggo
description: A savory mung bean stew with pork and leafy greens, a healthy and filling dish.
